warezcdn.name: Uragiri wa Boku no Namae wo Shitteiru
warezcdn.title: Uragiri wa Boku no Namae o Shitteiru

imdb.title: Uragiri wa Boku no Namae o Shitteiru
imdb.plot: Yuki Sakuragi is a soft-hearted high-schooler who was abandoned by his parents as a child and was raised in an orphanage. While cursed by mysterious dreams and the strange ability to read the thoughts of other people through touch...

episodes.title: Tune of Eternity
episodes.plot: After spending his life at Asahi Orphanage, Yuki is suddenly visited by a man claiming to be his brother. While deciding if he should live with family or stay, Yuki begins to lose control of his powers until his mysterious savior appears again.

episodes.title: Walpurgis Night
episodes.plot: Learning of the Giou clan and Duras leaves Yuki confused and shaken, but not quite ready to leave with them. Zess warns him to stay inside during the night of the blood-red moon-the Walpurgis Night. But when the red moon rises, danger comes with it.

episodes.title: A New Encounter
episodes.plot: Yuki learns about the danger behind his powers and his unavoidable fate. Zweilt Guardians, previous lives...it's all so much to take in. And more pressure is added when new allies appear by his side. Is Yuki prepared for his destiny?
